data.name: ChangePassword.InvalidOldPassword
data.value: The old password does not match the current one.

data.name: ChangePassword.UserDoesNotExist
data.value: This user seems to have been deleted.

data.name: RefreshToken.MissingRefreshToken
data.value: There is no RefreshToken in body or cookie.

data.name: RefreshToken.TokenAlreadyUsed
data.value: The token may have already been used. The token could be stolen.

data.name: RefreshToken.TokenFromAnotherClient
data.value: Invalid token. This token was created by another client.
